website_summaries.verdict: A stylish storage solution for those rooms with tricky corners, these shelves look great and are practical, too.
pros: However, it's also extremely functional with plenty of room for whatever you choose to store or display
Perfect for showing off decorative items
cons: Can be quite fiddly to put together and the instructions are quite vague

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The shelves were very easy to assemble. I highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a little splash of decoration in their home. Please note: Each shelf is about 8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Posting pictures to show the low-cheap quality. There are scrarches and nicks all over the particle board. And some of the predrilled screw holes don't align. I'm more upset about the scratches on the visible sides. I just pulled this out of the box. Guess this will be in the kids play room not my living room..
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: So easy and great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So easy to install! Under an hour and I'm a woman! I got this for my bedroom because I have small items such as hair clip, glasses and even lotions. I'm going to get another one for the other corner. I'm happy today because of this. It's going to be a good day regardless.
customer_reviews.author: choua

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This was so incredibly disappointing. The wood is cheap. When I went in to screw it together the screw just spun around. The wood wasn't dense enough to hold the screw in place. It crack and fell.apart. when I would get one section done and hold it up the piece would slip right off the wood
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea
customer_reviews.text: We are not the most handy people so it took us a bit to assemble the self and then hang it. The only instructions that you receive are on the side of the box so that didn't help much. The screws that are included are a shinny brass that really stand out on the dark wood, so I took a black marker and colored them in they look much better now. Overall very happy with this item and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good News in Amazon World
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together wood is not the greatest, but it looks good.I hope, I mean every one has different taste, so I hope my picture helps you decide if you want it or not. As far as weight, I would not recommending putting a lot of things on it, it is wall decor. Comes with everything need to mount on the wall nothing missing no damage box was in good order. Please note I brought the grey to match my walls and picture of Chicago (also for sale on amazon. $49.00) like if it’s helpful Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Real

customer_reviews.title: Great shelves!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, it arrived a day early then expected! Was pretty easy to put together since I used an electric screwdriver. I’d give it 5 stars but some of the wood did have small markings on it but I was able to rub most of them out and just face the wood towards the wall with the marks I couldn’t get out. Good corner shelves for the price. Already have a second one on the way for my husbands side of the bed! Would definitely buy again! Update on the second shelf I got: Arrived a day earlier then expected again! The grey did have a mark or two on it but they were able to be rubbed out.
customer_reviews.author: Spookyprincess

customer_reviews.title: Art Deco on the Cheap
customer_reviews.text: 2 Stars for the cheap build quality, complete with screw holes that easily strip out. 3 Stars for the somewhat cheesy finish. I think walnut version of these shelves match the interior of an old cheap trailer house exactly. 5 Stars for the better than average assembly instructions, especially in this day and age. 5 Stars for the stylish yet simplistic art deco design. I want to live in 70's era California instead.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: DONT BOTHER
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. As soon as I hung it up the entire shelf fell down. Mainly because it’s only held up by 3 screws. Even before hanging it up you can tell how flimsy it is. I am beyond disappointed in this product. Do not waste your time buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Decorative solution for otherwise wasted space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for odd inlet next to my fireplace. I added Greenco’s 2-tier zigzag floating shelves to this 5-tier corner shelving unit to accommodate my 7 chakras lotus tea light cups. Almost everything you see in my photo was purchased on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Parker

customer_reviews.title: You better have some crazy glue & tools
customer_reviews.text: While the shelf will look exactly like pictured... the cheap hardware/materials really barely make it through installation. They provide screw covers to hide the screws so that the shelf just looks 1 color, but MOST of them don’t stay in place- talk about a choking hazard for my dogs and baby. We now have to wait for some crazy glue so we can glue them down. The particle board came slightly lifted on one of the shelves as well- will have to glue that down as well. Also, the mounting screws are not enough to mount this thing. My husband needed to find larger screws to make space for the screw covers ... just such a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: LLama

customer_reviews.title: NO HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box all excited and ready to start building and there is absolutely no hardware. There are instructions that tell you what hardware there is supposed to be but that doesn't change the fact that the box just has the little shelves, foam, and the instructions. At least include a map so I could find the hardware...
customer_reviews.author: GlitterPuff

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just starting to redocrate and I get compliments on this shelf all the time, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Screw covers fall off
customer_reviews.text: A little awkward to assemble, but cute enough when done. The biggest problem is the little white plastic covers that are meant to go over the screws. If you screw the screws in all the way, the little caps fall right off, because the top of the screw is not flush with the shelf. If you loosen the screw slightluly to make them flush, the entire shelf gets wobbly and not at all sturdy. I may just glue the caps on to keep them in place, but either fix the pre-drilled screw holes, lengthen the little stems of the plastic covers, or send longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: Samjm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but usable, check pieces before installing.
customer_reviews.text: This item was mostly easy to assemble however I do not recommend buying this overall. Yes it's cheap and will suffice for simple shelving however my unit which was supposed to come with 2 "D" pieces and 3 "E" pieces came instead with 3 "D" pieces and only 2 "E" pieces so I had to modify the extra "D" piece to fit. It was also missing a long screw for mounting to the wall. I could have returned the item had I not already modified it with wiring holes through the inside corner of each shelf but I did not see the mismatched pieces until after I had done so.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney P. Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Good for price--however could be improvements
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if all edges were finished and they included colored screws to match color of shelf. The square parts had two unfinished edges that would show when hung. Managed to find a marker that matched so was able to match the rest so they would not show. They include small matching caps that are suppose to cover the screws holes, however they fall of quite easily. But for the price I doubt it can be beat! Recommend. I did use my own fasteners for the drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy would have never bought if I would have known
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t come with a paper ruler hole guide which was annoying anyways my mom thought it was cracked and I told her no it’s just very very flimsy no matter how tight the screws are put in I ever used larger anchors and screws doesn’t lie flat in middle on wall even know I put in all 3 anchors; it goes on the wall well but one part literally is not even flat on the wall because it’s so light and flimsy and I have very light items on it I would say it’s worth $10 do not buy if you’re going to put anything heavy on it or want a shelf that will last
customer_reviews.author: Zmayne

customer_reviews.title: These are only for a right side corner....
customer_reviews.text: ...like the picture shows 😖 We ordered 2, one for each side of our bed. I got the first one together fairly easy. (A bit awkward to hold and add each shelf) Lots of screws! lol Hubby helped me attach to the wall. The shelves are small. I put the second one together, and the holes on one of the shelves we’re missing so he had to drill into it. It cracked the piece. 😖 (ply board) Then when we went to attach it to his side, the LEFT side it wouldn’t work, even upside down. So we’re out the money on THAT one. 😔
customer_reviews.author: T/K B

customer_reviews.title: It's Decent
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit hard to assemble because some of the drilled holes were not aligned to the right side of the pieces they were supposed to attach to. Additionally there's only 3 predrilled holes to affix it to the wall and that seemed unsafe to me (it looked unsteady) so I drilled an additional 1 hole to affix to the wall. I think that they should probably make all wall panels affix to the wall (instead of 3 out of 5). Otherwise it looks ok, but I do cringe a bit when I see one of my dogs lay right under it!
customer_reviews.author: D2 Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Defective Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with one piece having the pre-drilled holes misaligned making assembly impossible. Same issue on the replacement I ordered. After successfully assembling the piece with some creativity I found that the provided screw caps hardly stayed put and had to be glued on. That said, after finally getting it all together and mounting it, the piece looks fantastic (there are gaps between my wall and the shelf but I'm fairly certain that's my wall's fault and not the shelf) and feels sturdy enough. Overall I'd give the whole experience a meh.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The package didn't contain all the pieces and the structure is not stable at all
customer_reviews.text: The package was damages. The pieces were missing. I was supposed to receive two D pieces and three E pieces and I received 5 D pieces. Even if I managed to build it, the structure is not stable at all. I am expecting that it will fall down soon. DO NOT BUY. Poor quality, poor material, horrible result.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara Amato

customer_reviews.title: People will say Wow when they see it!
customer_reviews.text: A great product to display your small picture frames or nick nacks. The product came in a good box, very well packaged. Instructions are excellent and made installing very easy. I would suggest you measure your area prior to installing. I installed it under an hour. Looks outstanding and the product is very nice looking and doesn’t look cheap. For the money this is an ideal product to display lots of things, I ended up purchasing 2 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Yohobo

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t looking for anything fancy. Just a little something for my office to put a few little things on to get them off of my desk. This shelf seemed like a perfect fit. While it is super inexpensive...it’s also really flimsy. Once assembled, you can’t really pick it up, the shelves pull away from the screws. Luckily, I caught it before ripping apart and quick hung it up. For 20 bucks...it does the job....just be wary.....and be gentle. I would probably would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fox Stull

customer_reviews.title: I don't love this. I barely like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this. I barely like it. I thought it would be great for a tiny statement piece in the random corner above the bed. It was easy enough to assemble based on the instructions. it is far too flimsy/unstable to trust above me sleeping at night. I talking about the 5 tier. I should have gotten the smaller version. The mounting hardware is ridiculous and I ended up with a small hole in my wall and no corner shelf. I'm sure if your handy you can add some sort of support and buy better mounting hardware but I'm incredibly lazy and posting this review has pretty much tapped me out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good as a bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: The directions were easy to follow for assembly, but I had to use a short handled screwdriver to put it all together. It's not as sturdy as I would like, but that's not noticeable once it's attached to the wall. These shelves do not fit books (except the top), they are smaller than I orginally thought. It looks pretty on the wall for decor and decor display purposes, but I wanted something with more capacity for books.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Large fits alot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for organizing my hair and beauty products that were cluttering my vanity. Gave me lots more space. It was more shelving than I needed for that area, so I divided them up and put some of it in my daughter's room above her desk. I think I might buy another one for the dining room above our nook table to display my tea pots and Disney mugs! Comes with the hardware including dry wall screw holders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, it just....
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was the perfect size to display the collectables I bought it for. The appearance and size where exactly as advertised and the assembly easily done. The only thing keeping it from 5 stars is that it felt flimsy. Once assembled, it was wobbly and wanted to curve even when laying flat. Even putting it on the wall, you have to put all the screws in a little bit and then tighten them a little at a time so that the anchors would actually pull it straight.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Rickard

customer_reviews.title: made CHEAPLY
customer_reviews.text: item looked very CHEAP upon arrival, I would not recommend I tried to return it within the return policy time frame and was only going to get 1/2 of my money back. I will NOT order from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall mou t
customer_reviews.text: Nice wall mount for the money. When putting it together, I recommend doing it on it's side because it starts to get a little flimsy the more you add on layers. Oh make sure you pay attention to holes in middle for wall mounting so you don't have to undo it all. Looks nice and great price. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble alone
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this needs some pre-assembly, which isn't in the instructions. Also, the wall anchors aren't great, maybe use some better ones. It makes sense there wouldn't be a stud that close to the corner. I was all set to give this an awful review, but now that it's up, it does look cute. It's got lightweight items on it and it seems pretty secure. For the price, it's a cute corner shelf. Just grab a buddy for setup and pre-assemble a couple of sections at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Sturdy feeling.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great. It would look better if my house wasn't 119 years old and had straight 90 degree corners. But I can't blame this product for that. It was fairly easy to assemble, one piece was countersunk on the wrong side but I just countersunk the right side and it was fine. I would recommend upgrading the screws going into the wall like I did if you are securing to drywall or plaster. If securing to a stud the supplied screws are fine. Overall seems like it will be a nice shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana D

customer_reviews.title: Useful if Your Walls are Square
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is a little off on the design or my walls aren't square but it works for little knickknacks. Thought the shelves would be a little bit deeper to allow for more space but I make do. I can't say I hate it, but I can't say I'm in love with it either. It was a bit difficult to put together without scratching the surface and I would suggest a second pair of hands when mounting it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Impressed! A quality solid beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with the quality for the price of this bed! It was very easy to put together that my 12 year old and I both put it together. This is not a solo project. It will take two people to put this bed together. The package that the bed was shipped in was well thought out and protected our bed perfectly with all parts and tool needed for the bolts. It is heavy with many parts so be ready! The directions are easy to read and it took us about 1 hour 45 minutes to put together. The end result is the bed is loved dearly by my daughter as it is her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Zara's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The wall shelf comes with 11 pieces to attach together, in a simple order, per the instructions. This process would be quite a breeze, IF you were to receive all of the correct pieces in the package. I received an incorrect shelf piece (they have letters on them for easy assembly, and was unable to assemble, due to the correct piece missing from the box. We assembled what we could and ended up with about half of the shelf to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Helpful for the useless corners in rooms. Fit and finish is pretty good. The assembly isn’t difficult per se but a little confusing at times. It hangs on the wall with three screws. Since this fixture will hold small and light objects, I don’t see that being a problem. The plastic caps to cover the screws really didn’t work well and needed to be super glued in place once final assembly was done.
customer_reviews.author: Streetlethal1000

customer_reviews.title: Mounting issues
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeballing these shelves for 2 years to place around my vanity area I love the design. I do want to warn people who purchase this item that the reinforcements that come with it do not allow these shelves to stay where there suppose to. I found when I put my shelves up with what I was given the screws didn't grab like they should have so I had to buy additional wall reinforcements so they would mount appropriately. Other then that cute shelves for a cute little area setup. :)
customer_reviews.author: Genevie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money!!! Two of screws were striped and the covers for the screws didn't stay. The picture is very zoomed in cause the shelves are tiny not like the picture shown at all. But I wouldn't recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and stylish in a budget son!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these from the amazon warehouse sections for about $45 and I have to say, that I’m glad that I did. Very easy to install and a very sturdy as well. I read some review Ls with people stating that shelved fell down after install. My suggestion with any of these shelves is to go to Home Depot and buy a set of a 100 or more of dry wall screws that made with better quality for like $7-10 bucks and they will hold more weight then any of the dry wall studs provided.
customer_reviews.author: OneSwordToRuleThemAll

customer_reviews.title: Loved but not easily reversible
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't tell you that it isn't reversible. We bought to put on a shared wall over a desk. We installed one and it was great. When we went to install the other, we could not flip the pieces around so that it would look symmetrical. We ended up having to take off the top and bottom pieces so the difference wasn't so obvious. Only then did we have to get creative to make the top and bottom shelves sturdy. It worked out though and ended up looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Waden

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color shipped.  PAY ATTENTION PLEASE!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived just fine. But I PLAINLY ordered white. An ugly gray arrived. I suppose I can paint it one day. But it's too much trouble to ship it back. Ugh ... More work for me to do.
customer_reviews.author: 0B0E1AL

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for a low quality product, looks cool, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I honestly was hoping the quality would be better then it is. The design is really cool and it looks nice from far away. It's wobbly when it's fully assembled before you attach it to the wall. And the little buttons to cover the screws do not fully cover them. I wish the screws were flush with the wood. It was pretty easy to put together. The anchors that come with it are garbage. Had to use other ones to anchor to the wall. All in all I'd say I like it. I think it was over priced for sure, but it looks cool and im glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron/Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shelf I ever encountered.
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. Its sitting I'm my garbage bin because yesterday was the last day to do a return. And that's where it belongs. Because this is an Absolute trash product. The screw holes don't line up so you're drilling into the board and because the holes are so close to the wall when trying to put them in a drill becomes useless. Got the first board in and then nothing from that point forward would line up. After three half drilled boards were dangling I ripped it off the wall and tossed it directly in the trash. Save your money and dont buy this absolute cock block of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. As I do not go to the person's house I can only assume it was either utilized, given away, or it's still in the box. When it was received, the box had a bit of damage to it however further inspection showed no signs of damage to the shelves. The product seemed very sturdy and the color was very pretty. Assembly instructions were straightforward and simple to follow. I really liked how unique this shelving was and would consider purchase for my own home in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TheSilverFox

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Overall we love these shelves. They look great once they're installed. Quality control seems to be pretty decent there were some very minor defects but nothing concerning. They are wobbly once put together but after you screw it to the wall it's no longer an issue. Also the directions could definitely be a little more clear but with a little know-how and a few minutes of your time it goes together easily.
customer_reviews.author: MWAT

customer_reviews.title: Simple Corner Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Picked up two of these to offset in a room. It looks good. I mean it’s cheap but it doesn’t look horrible. It’s pretty simple to assemble even though there are a few tight spots you might want to use a pivot screwdriver on. The space between shelves is close to 8” so not a lot of room but you probably already know if it’s enough space for what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: As cheap as the price
customer_reviews.text: They're cheap, so obviously they're made of cheap material. People need to stop being surprised by this fact. That being said, I like them! They're a little smaller than I thought (probably should have looked at the dimensions), but they're exactly what I ordered and they offer a cute display for all the quirky things I tend to hoard. It's incredibly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: so disappointed when i received the package with the incorrect parts. returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: lina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tight space.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf unit. I had two really tight open spots in a bathroom and a standard shelving unit was just taking up too much room. So I bought one shelving unit - took about 10 min to assemble and it was the PERFECT floating shelving unit. I turned around and bought another for the other codner. They updated the bathroom so much. Highly recommend for the hard to fit area.
customer_reviews.author: BA Bartosch

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and design, but the quality is not there. I got 1/4 of the way through (thankfully) when I noticed one part of the shelving would not sit flush. The pre-drilled holes were stripped and the screws were spinning without being able to grab onto anything to hold the fit tight, which would mean it wouldn't be able to support weight on that shelf. The gap was more than 1/8". Bummed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Estes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the open boxed great condition ones for $11 and for that price you can’t go wrong. It assembles easily. It looks great. I finally have a great place to put my daughters night light and baby monitor. I used a tape measure so I knew how big it was going to be, no surprises there. Honestly better quality than most things out there right now.
customer_reviews.author: Slig

customer_reviews.title: This looks great in my living room I use it for some ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my living room I use it for some video game related collectable and I love how it looks and holds everything on it. However I will recommend you get proper wall anchor for dry wall as the included will not hold a paper clip to the wall. I must say while i love the shelf the lowest most part came damaged for me in that i could not screw it togeather and it was loose and almost completly broke durring assembly. outside of that this thing looks amazing holds up well and its really just a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: SpectacularInsanity

customer_reviews.title: Watch the sides when putting it together. The white finish should face outward.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf to put in my daughter’s bedroom. It looks great and she has already covered it with her collectibles. I will be getting another one for her. Even though the directions were pictures it went together pretty easy. Just pay attention to the outside edges. The white finished side should be on the outside edge. Because we knew my daughter wasn’t putting anything heavy on it, we only screwed in into the wall without anchors. The shelf space was a bit smaller than I expected, but it has worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are clear and the design is straight forward. They really add something finished feeling to a empty corner. Finish looks good and they do not take up a lot of space. The curve in the shelf does reduce the storage area. They are just big enough for a small picture frame or a couple of smaller candles, not meant for bigger flower pots, ie...
customer_reviews.author: ZAMODA

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. It isn't easy to put together, but is not sturdy at all. The screws provided do not hold the boards together securely. If you screw them in all the way it isn't sturdy, and you can't put the screw covers on. The shelves are also short enough that a full size screwdriver can't fit between them, so have fun putting together! The rounded shelves extend just a millimeter beyond the upright shelves and that makes the whole thing look very cheap. Would love to return, but the thought of having to disassemble is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Count the screws before you build it!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to count the number of screws before counting!! We were building our shelf and realized that there weren't enough screws in the box. We looked veeeery carefully, and there were def not enough. Unfortunately, we had already build half the shelf and didn't want to disassemble the whole thing just to get a refund. We ended up having to go to Home Depot to buy more screws because there weren't enough screws to put together the shelf. Super annoying..
customer_reviews.author: Moosey

customer_reviews.title: Ummmmm idk
customer_reviews.text: I looked literally everywhere in stores but had to order it here. Its really poor quality for the price. If you have the option cut the wood and do it yourself. Looks ok but super not what i expected
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not that great 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: It’s so small and not very durable, also they cut the holes wrong on one of the pieces so I had to make my own so it would actually fit. I wouldn’t buy it again the picture makes it look large and sturdy but it’s not and assembly is weird because they want you to assemble it on the wall but it’s actually much easier to put it together and then screw it into the wall. Also only 3 pieces are actually screwed into the wall all the other pieces stick up off the wall and it’s not cute at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Little flimsy till it is put on the wall but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on the wall. It's a little cumbersome to put together but not horrible, just watch the instructions to know which boards go together. The plastic pieces that cover the screws don't stay in very well. It is pretty fragile until you get it on the wall. We don't have anything heavy on it but it does look nice once it up. In fact the hubs asked for a second one to hangup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design—-Dumb anchor points
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely could have been designed a bit better. I hope they really read this review. Most wall studs are in the corner but they put the holes for the product in the middle. I had to drill my own holes so that I could install this in the corner like it was made to be installed. That really made me think that whoever put this product out didn’t really put too much into the installation. The design is quite nice though!
customer_reviews.author: Neeka

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It went together fairly easily, not difficult to assemble it all. If you have a long screwdriver you may have a problem putting it together. I found that only three holes are used to actually mount it to the wall and they are nowhere near where is stud would normally be. The anchors that they sent were pretty flimsy and I used my own.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product EVER.......
customer_reviews.text: Worst product EVER....HARDWARE...destroys the product, substandard...destroys the holes....no glue or re-enforcement to ensure pieces stay to ether. Horrible experience putting together...WASTE OF MONEY...only writing a review...because...BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom's room so she'd have a place for her trinkets. Fairly easy to assemble following instructions, and easy enough to mount as well. Keep in mind, the piece might curve a bit naturally, so make sure to align it with the wall and secure it before you start mounting the screws to avoid any unwanted curving.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Shelf is fairly small
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shelf looks great in my home. I only have two issues with the shelf. One being that the clearing for each tier is relatively small and the second was that the screw holes on the unit were too small and deep to use a pencil or pen to mark the wall were you want to put the anchor for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Takes time but is worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: The product comes with the individual shelf pieces, the screws and plastic anchors. I recommend buying your own anchors, or toggle bolts, because the ones given are pretty cheap and didn’t expand well enough in the wall to support the shelves. You have to screw each shelf into the other, and to do so you need a small Phillips screwdriver. I recommend a “small” one because it’s harder to do so with a larger one as it won’t fit between the shelves. When all put together and hung, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This item is awful in quality. Once assembled it was not a 90 degree angle and was almost impossible to attach to the wall. Once it was attached it was only legitimately attached to one side, therefor, not secure to hold anything. Once taken off the wall to address later the top board completely broke through via the screws that were holding it to the rest of the shelves. Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Grey

customer_reviews.title: Heavier and taller than expected; split into two shelves
customer_reviews.text: I didn't consider the total height as I was planning to put them above a desk. So I split them into two units which was relatively easy. I needed help to assemble (a long 6' long flat surface would have helped). The supplied dry-wall screws didn't seem strong enough to hold all the weight so I switched to wood screws mounted in the corner where there was a stud. Overall pleased with the look.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a 5, but the first order didn't come with screws. I needed a small shelf in my bathroom to help store everyday items. It fits well, not perfect, but not bad for the price. It's not top quality, but it was the only product I could find that could fit where I needed it to. Overall, I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gsrc111

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but Useable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and flimsy, it’s basically a Walmart-quality shelf, but it’s cute to display a few small things on. We did use our own, longer screws and made sure it was screwed into the studs to it won’t fall, plus anchored it on every back piece instead of just the few predrilled spots. Overall I’m happy with it. It doesn’t come complete imo because I would trust the screws they send to hold up a feather, but it serves its purpose with a little handyman tlc.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Check your wall corners for squareness.
customer_reviews.text: Check your wall corners for squareness. If they're not square, the shelf will not be flush with the wall. If that matters to you consider a different design. These "could be designed" with an adjustable or more flexible "angle" at each shelf level that could avoid that issue. For me the corners aren't well lit and it's inconsequential.
customer_reviews.author: Transient Noise

customer_reviews.title: It’s just enough
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars only because I thought the shelves would be bigger. The pictures and other reviews made it look like it could take more things. I can’t really find things small enough to fit on the shelves so it’s really annoying me. But it’s nice. The little white nail clips to cover where the nails are is brilliant and I wish all my products had those. Some didn’t fit the nails but I got most of them. It also felt slightly unsteady but once I mounted it it was good (hopefully). Overall, it’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ayah Allam

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. It fit perfect in our corner of the house just as we desired the only issue is our walls and not with the product itself. They are hollow so getting this to be assembled to the wall served a little bit of a challenge but we were able to get it up and it is pretty sturdy we will be filling it with a couple more ornaments and decor and then will be done we absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: L. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, not good for things that would need to be plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, took me less than 15 minutes (though I did use a power drill; I imagine it'd take twice that time hand-screwing 23 screws) Looks nice, shelves do not have much space in between as other reviewers have said but it's great for some small stuffed animals and a few other nicknacks Unfortunately, it's really useless for anything that needs to be plugged in. I intended to put the baby monitor on the shelving but there is no where for the cord to go.
customer_reviews.author: R A F

customer_reviews.title: Decent corner shelves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Hey are good enough for the price. These are particle boards, so not super strong. Good to put some toys and a few kids books. Nothing too heavy. The color is more towards the darker brown / almost black. Although curved, the flat edges are sharp. I will have to put some soft baby proofing once my kid starts crawling / walking. The wall screws and drywall plugs are a joke. Don’t recommend using them, I could just pull out the entire shelf. I got better ones from a local hardware that’s rated for 50lb capacity each. This thing isn’t moving anywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: kvam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy display for small décor
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little shelf! I needed someplace up and out of my children’s reach for little precious moments statues. This is the perfect size and utilizes space I never even realized we had available. Would not recommend for pic frames 5x7 and larger, as each shelf is not very tall. But for little Knick knacks and things you’d like to display, it is absolutely perfect! And so cheap. Assembly was very easy- don’t overthink it lol. And installation was even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Reese

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy
customer_reviews.text: Dry easy to assemble. The shelves were not very sturdy once assembled. The mollies that were included for installation bent going into the wall. The shelves are much smaller than the images in the pictures look. I took it down after the first night. It wasn’t what I expected at all and I was afraid it would fall and tear up the drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Anne Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I had a bare corner in my living area that just needed something. I gambled and this shelving unit wound up looking great. I was able to add a few light plants and photos without worry. It is sturdy and I found there was enough room for the decor. I had help assembling this and it didn't take too much work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DelMastro

customer_reviews.title: Good Design.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted two of these on either side of my bed on the corner of my room and they work great. They are a little smaller then I expected and you can only put one item on each shelf such as a picture, an Amazon Echo, or a wax burner. They were easy to build and hang. It didn't fit perfectly in the corner but once mounted it contours to the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelf
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old installed this herself that is how easy it is to do. Note to measure the space as it maybe to high and not be able to fit all of the shelving that comes with it, as shown here missing 2 but she took it down and lowered it a bit to add the others. Very sturdy looks stylish.
customer_reviews.author: mika

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this unit is meant to be used for storage, but it is a nice eye-catcher for some small items. We got two of them, to make them symmetrical on opposing sides of the same wall, I had to do some simple adjustments, but it looks great. Again, it is not very sturdy, but it works for our purpose!
customer_reviews.author: boneless

customer_reviews.title: Pieces didn't match up quite right
customer_reviews.text: I had all of the pieces, but they weren't perfect. There is an indentation where the head of the screw goes so it will lay flat with the wood, but there was no way to get all of the pieces facing the right way with the indentation on the correct side. Slightly annoying, but you can't tell from a distance and I wasn't expecting perfection for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The box was delivered undamaged, good start. Everything listed on the instructions was in the box. Put together in maybe 15 minutes then about 10 minutes to hang it. As others have stated, i would definitely get different drywall anchors. The ones that come with it have no lip to catch onto the drywall so they slide into the wall when you try to screw into it. Looks good hung with a few items on it. Just don't expect to put anything big on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn DiCenza

customer_reviews.title: Poor anchors
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it is to assemble, however, to install on the wall was extremely difficult, the amount anchors are cheap and either are too big to go in the whole or they would slip into the wall, also your wall needs to measure exactly 90 degrees all the way down the wall or it will have major gaps, however, for the price it is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Angel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this looks it completely ties my room together and I enjoy having a place to put some of my knick knacks. Only down side is I wanted to put more books on this shelf, but it’s not really a good bookshelf. It probably could hold 20-35 lbs of weight, so maybe a couple books and light knick knacks. If you’re looking for storage capacity I don’t think this will work, but for an aesthetic? I’d say go for it
customer_reviews.author: The Wredd Witch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelves! But...
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice piece!! Only thing I should have been mindful of is when you’re screwing the pieces in, the space between each shelf does not work with a regular size screwdriver. I had difficulties trying to fit my hand and the screwdriver into the corner of the shelf to screw it in. Other than that, it really is an attractive piece nd very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes the shelf look like it has bigger spaces, but that’s okay. I really like the look of it. We were hesitant about putting it up because the first two screws lead the right side to look like it wasn’t going to be flush to the wall, but the last screw helped a lot with lining it. I love the color. Can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Moules

customer_reviews.title: Cute addition to bedroom, slightly difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is a perfect addition to my newly renovated room. The assembly was quite difficult, it took the help of a couple people to figure it out. The butterflies and screws were too small for the holes and it ended up falling inside my wall. Luckily my cousin‘s husband had extra butterflies and larger screws and was able to successfully mount it on my wall. Other than the holes being too small and the directions not being that clear, this corner wall shelf is absolutely adorable and just what I was looking for. The color is amazing as well. It is quite smaller than I thought it would be but I’m still able to use it for my decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Jacintha

customer_reviews.title: Will not mirror
customer_reviews.text: Please note that no where in the description did it say they would mirror. I bought them for that purpose. However once they are place on the walls and the items are placed on them it may not bother you that they don't mirror--I will always see that they don't but for the price I can live with it. Maybe the company will consider selling a left and right corner shelf so that they truly mirror. If so I would definitely replace the left shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Dessa Francis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install, it really need to read the directions, otherwise, it’s not that hard to put together. Spaces in between are not that big. Was hoping it could fit my plants, but can only do so at the very top. Shelves are big enough to hold small trinkets or picture frames.
customer_reviews.author: LaShunda

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. However, both of the "D" parts are missing half the predrilled holes. So now I risk splintering the particle board to drill them.. Also there are parts that don't fit together sturdy and are wobbly. Hopefully once I get it on the wall this won't be an issue... I don't believe I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Really big
customer_reviews.text: The wall this is on is an 8ft wall and we had to put the shelf to the ceiling for it to not look awkward being too close to the floor. This shelf does look really nice and was able to hold quite a bit on it. We wanted a place for nerdy collectibles and knick knacks and this was just the right addition to the room. Would definitely recommend to anyone just looking for a cheap yet not cheap looking shelf. Assembly was very easy and has been sturdy. Will buy again when we need another corner shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Corey McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing small books!
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews that we're posted, it did take about 30 mins to assemble however, it was totally worth the time. Other consideration is that we had to use an extra screw to hold the design in place. DEFINITELY check and measure the corner of your wall to the design. It was off by a couple of millimeters when we installed it. In the picture it's able to hold books if it's leaned sideways. The shelves are to small in order to stack the books straight up. Other than that it's seems good so far. Will give an update later on...
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelves
customer_reviews.text: These shelves were relatively easy to put together once I got the hang of it. There were some snags when I made it about half way as my drill could not get in at the right angle. I found that putting the shelves together in 3 parts and then connecting the parts together made for a better situation. The package came with everything that I needed and it took me about a half hour to make the entire shelf and mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids room!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. One tier had a portion peeled off but my decorations covered that. The only difficult part was placing in the corner. One wall I hit concrete. Had to get special drill bit, concrete nail and anchors, that meant a trip to the store. The other wall, I used a sturdier drywall anchor with 1 nail it came with. I place it in my daughters room and placed some of her beanie boos for display. Now stuck finding another way to display the rest of her collection. I managed to fit 20 beanies on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for looks but not for functionality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these shelves for my basement. They were not extremely hard to assemble but you definitely need someone there to help hang them up. The wood was chipped in a few places, the shelves are pretty small, and I wouldn't put anything too heavy on them. However, for the price, they look great and work fine as long as small, light things are placed on them.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzee B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Product was a lot smaller than it appeared. Was easy to put together, but the pre-drilled holes were too big for the included screws. Once the shelf was put together, it was very wobbly and weak. Unable to use larger diameter screws because the mdf board split and fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: poor product fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look on the web site but this product is so flimsy that pieces fell off before it was even attached to the wall...the screws do not fit properly causing each piece to be loose. Once attached to the wall, the bottom piece fell off and the screws will not tighten to put it back on. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: OK for what they are
customer_reviews.text: They arent real strong but they are functional. The white caps that cover the screw holes dont go on easily and dont stay on well. I ended up leaving them off and just painting the shelf the same color as the woodwork and it loos pretty good
customer_reviews.author: T. Small

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest piece of crap. It’s all scratched the corner are smashed the facing is popping off. Worse part of it all is now I got re-ship this piece of crap back before I can do anything. Always Amazons stuff most normal seller would say throw it out I’ll refund or send a new one grrr course it’s amazons!
customer_reviews.author: KayleneDonnie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pieces sometimes... be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Great book shelf but I am happy I purchased two of them. Vendor put all the wrong sizes in one and the other had the right ones. I give it a two becasue of the lack if attention to detail. Since ai am handy Inwas able to manuver the second shelf by drilling in wholes myself to fit the nails... but I can see a customer being completely annoyed by this defect. Other than that great shelf...it holds up pretty well. If it wasnt for that... I ended up with unnecessary surplus of the wrong pieces... and the wrong nails. Again thank goodness I had some lying around. This product would have gotten a 5/5. Please fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great, buy make sure you have the correct instructions before you start
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 if these shelves. I had a problem assembling the first one, as it was packaged with the instructions for the 4 shelf unit. It lead to problems that could only be fixed by drilling addl holes, to avoid taking it apart too many times since it is particle board. When I opened the second one, it had the appropriate instructions and went very smoothly! They look great now that they are assembled and up.
customer_reviews.author: Acute PT

product_meta.title: Greenco 5 Tier Wall Mount Corner Shelves Walnut Finish
product_meta.description: Color:WalnutThese Corner shelves are functional and attractive alike. It matches almost every decor and is great for your kitchen, dining room, living room or office. Use it as a practical shelf or to display collectibles, photos etc. or decorative items. It's easy to mount and comes with all necessary mounting hardware. Dimensions in inches: 7.75" L x 7.75" W x 48.5" H.
feature_bullets: 5 tier wall mount corner shelves Made of durable MDF laminate.
Beautiful Walnut finish that suits almost any decor.
Easy to mount with all necessary hardware Included.
Decorative and functional for your home, office, or dorm room.
Dimensions in inches: 7.75" L x 7.75" W x 48.5" H.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars11,880 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
